name: He Feeds On Your Tears (10 player)
descr: Defeat Algalon the Observer in 10-player mode without any raid member dying to Algalon at any point during that raid lockout period.
tooltip:
He Feeds On Your Tears (10 player)

Defeat Algalon the Observer in 10-player mode without any raid member dying to Algalon at any point during that raid lockout period.
